column5: Beautiful WATERFRONT property at Compass Condominiums located on a cul-de-sac with private drive, pool, elevator, boat slip & ICW access. The 1 Bed/1 Bath unit is on the ground floor, fully furnished, walk-in closet with open concept layout, washer/dryer & private canal-facing patio. Sleeps up to 4 with 1 queen bed & sleeper sofa in the living room. Great location, minutes from the beach & Schlitterbahn, this cozy community offers 1st class living on the TX Gulf Coast. Price includes tax.
column8: Condo on a Canal Relax and Unwind
